          <title>
            <string language="en">Different kinds of electromagnetic radiation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschiedliche Arten der elektromagnetischen 
Strahlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différents genres de rayonnement 
électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos diferentes da radiação eletromagnética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Generi differenti di radiazione elettromagnetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορετικά είδη ηλεκτρομαγνητικής ακτινοβολίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversas clases de radiación electromágnetica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the different kinds of electromagnetic radiation arranged in increasing wavelength and frequency.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">frequency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gamma rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microwaves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">x-rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infrared radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radiowaves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultraviolet radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die 
unterschiedlichen Arten der elektromagnetischen Strahlung geordnet in 
zunehmender Wellenlänge und in Frequenz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre les différents genres de 
rayonnement électromagnétique disposés dans la longueur d'onde et 
la fréquence croissantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra os tipos diferentes da 
radiação eletromagnética arranjados no wavelength e na freqüência
crescentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra i generi differenti di 
radiazione elettromagnetica organizzati nella lunghezza d'onda e nella
frequenza aumentanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τα διαφορετικά είδη 
ηλεκτρομαγνητικής ακτινοβολίας που τακτοποιούνται στο αυξανόμενες 
μήκος κύματος και τη συχνότητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra las diversas clases de 
radiación electromágnetica dispuestas en longitud de onda y 
frecuencia de aumento.</string>
          </description>
